Text: I get a double picture when I play it, both with CMP and with VLC. Anyone know how I can fix it? Thanks for the upload btw!
@bailtail, you are getting a double picture because its in 3d! Read the title.  You need a 3d tv for this dude.
@dkwon Yeah, I realised that, lol. Didn't read the title too closely before downloading; silly me!
